de.dhbw.stress_yourself.reflection

Class Reflection

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dhbw.stress_yourself.reflection.Reflection

  • public class Reflection
extends java.lang.Object
    The Reflection class is a extension to the Reflection API and provides some usefull methods to find and get classes out of a jar file
    Author:
    Tobias Roeding

      • runMethod

        public static java.lang.Object runMethod(java.lang.reflect.Method function,
                         java.lang.Object o,
                         java.lang.Object[] params)
        Runs the specified Method in the context of the specified Object and with the parameter which were given.
        Parameters:
        function - The method to run
        o - The object of the class
        params - The parameter the function is called with
        Returns:
        An object of the return value of the function (has to be casted to use)

        Parameters:
        pathToJar - File path to the jar file
